# add2md

The goal of add2md is to
help R users to type markdown in `.Rmd`.


## Installation

You can install the released version of add2md from [Github](https://github.com/JiaxiangBU/add2md) with:

```{r eval=F}
devtools::install_github('JiaxiangBU/add2md')
```

```{r eval=F}
library(add2md)
```
